TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Pungudan, title = Pungudan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pungudan} }

S.FORM: = Pungudan = Gaga mniq Pingtung Mutansyang ka alang Pungudan. 130 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 359 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 90% niqan 323 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 10% niqan 36 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Paiwan86%, Amis1%, Bunun1%, Rukai1%, ni rahuq na o1%.

= Pongodan = Gaga mniq Pingtong Motansyang ka alang Pongodan. 130 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 359 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 90% niqan 323 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 10% niqan 36 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Paiwan86%, Amis1%, Bonon1%, Rokai1%, ni rahoq na o1%.
